post:
Hey guys,   
My name is Hassan and I'm here from ReverseHosts.com to offer you a special discount on our 512MB 1GB and 2GB RAM plans. These will be hosted with QuickPacket in Atlanta, GA, and with Calihop in San Diego, CA. We have been around since September of 2012 and are always working on improving our services. These VPSs use OpenVZ and SolusVM. Free LAMP template available as well. 

_Test IPs:_   
Atlanta, GA: 199.233.235.235  
San Diago, CA: 67.207.208.210  
   
**VPS 512**
 
- 60GB Disk Space
- 1 TB Bandwidth
- 512MB RAM
- 1024MB Burst
- 4 vCPU Cores
- 1 IPv4 Address
- 100Mbps Port
- OpenVZ/SolusVM
- **PROMOCODE: LET512ANNUAL**

Order Now:  
$19.99/year - [San Diego, CA](https://clients.reversehosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=64)  
$19.99/year - [Atlanta, GA](https://clients.reversehosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=55)

$3.99/mo - [Atlanta, GA](https://clients.reversehosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=53)
